import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; function Booking() { const [email, setemail] = useState({}); const [phone, setphone] = useState({}); const [date, setdate] = useState({}); const [hour, sethour] = useState({}); const { sid } = useParams(); const id =sessionStorage.getItem('user_id'); console.log(id); // start Add books const booking = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const response = await fetch(`http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/Book`, { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" }, body: JSON.stringify({ email: email, phone: phone, date: date, hour: hour }), }); if (response.ok) { window.alert("you have booked successfully") } } return (
